## ResolveOptions.mainFields property

A list of main fields in description files. Default `['browser', 'module', 'import', 'jsnext:main', 'main']`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
mainFields?: (string | string[] | {
        name: string | string[];
        forceRelative: boolean;
    })[];
```
